workshoptitle: Simplify User Management by integrating Oracle Autonomous Database and Oracle Cloud Identity

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second for LiveLabs. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setup the Environment and Cloud Shell
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 2: OCI Wallet and Enable IAM
tutorials.description: Generate your wallet file & use it to connect and enable IAM

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Database Credentials and Login
tutorials.description: Create IAM credentials for users and access ADB with those credentials

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
